BR_text.BRsummary: [Dashboard] Blank screens when clicking on expand buttons
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-h:h4>Setup</denchmark-h>
 
 
 ray 1.1.0.dev0
 python 3.7
 multinode-setup (2 nodes) in docker on mesos dcos (but I can also reproduce it in single node setup)
 Browser: chromium browser Version 86.0.4240.75 on ubuntu 18.04
 
 After starting a node screen turns blank and console error appears:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30770185/98787874-5afc0d80-2400-11eb-8ef4-a9a35e5b474a.png></denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
 
 I did some tests and was able to reproduce it like this:
 run python docker: docker run --net host -it python:3.7 bash 
 pip install -U ray
 ray install-nightly
 ray start --head
 python
 In the python terminal
 import ray
 ray.init()
 @ray.remote
 def test():
     import time
     time.sleep(10)
     print('finished')
 test.remote()
 Running the test.remote() results in the blank screen
 Related on slack:
 <denchmark-link:https://ray-distributed.slack.com/archives/CP950VC76/p1603863841085400>https://ray-distributed.slack.com/archives/CP950VC76/p1603863841085400</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/TanjaBayer>@TanjaBayer</denchmark-link>
  Thanks for reporting this. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ijrsvt>@ijrsvt</denchmark-link>
  hit the same issue. I'm working on a fix for this now.

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rkooo567>@rkooo567</denchmark-link>
  I just made a PR to fix this: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/11954>#11954</denchmark-link>
  could you please take a look when you have a chance? I'll check back to make sure tests pass CI in an hour or so.
